question: Ministry of Rural Development conducted an event 'Antyodaya Diwas' on __________.
explanation: Ministry of Rural Development conducted an event named 'Bharat ke Kaushalzaade', to honour beneficiaries of its skill development programmes, at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi. The event was conducted on 24th September 2017, which is observed as 'Antyodaya Diwas'. Beneficiaries of Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY) and Rural Self Employment Training Institutes (RSETI) were honoured.
